Title: 2. Stakeholders
Write-Up Text: In a rare show of unity a group of people ranging from politicians to business leaders and community advocates have urged the Australian government to make substantial increases to JobSeeker Youth Allowance and related payments through the upcoming May budget. Former Treasury Secretary Ken Henry also highlighted that it's cruel not to take action to raise these rates and the Albanese Labor Government was reminded of its promise to address gender inequality. Overall the people have called on the government to deliver on their promises and listen to the concerns of the Australian public.
